definition: in sequence/in the proper order/one by one/in turn
to suffer/to endure/to pull through (hard times)/to delay/to stall/to play for time/to dawdle
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: Rearrange the sentences in the story. Story 1.
sentences.chinese: 出示故事中的不按挨次胪列的句子。

sentences.english: Should pay attention to in order to listen to, is said.
sentences.chinese: 要注意挨次，是先听后说。

sentences.english: I would like to present our comments in the following order.
sentences.chinese: 我希望能依照以下的挨次提出咱们的看法。

sentences.english: We expect payment in advance on first orders.
sentences.chinese: 我们期望第挨次订货请求预付货款。

definition: one after the other/in single file
old rules/example from the past/former practices
we will not elaborate on that (used as pluralis auctoris)
(old) to bow and utter polite phrases/to open the way (for a dignitary etc)
